mwa-config-allowpasswordchange: Description of the configuration variable $wgMediaWikiAuthAllowPasswordChange for [[mw:Extension:MediaWikiAuth|Extension:MediaWikiAuth]].
mwa-config-apiurl: Description of the configuration variable $wgMediaWikiAuthApiUrl for [[mw:Extension:MediaWikiAuth|Extension:MediaWikiAuth]].
mwa-config-importgroups: Description of the configuration variable $wgMediaWikiAuthImportGroups for [[mw:Extension:MediaWikiAuth|Extension:MediaWikiAuth]].
mwa-config-disableaccountcreation: Description of the configuration variable $wgMediaWikiAuthDisableAccountCreation for [[mw:Extension:MediaWikiAuth|Extension:MediaWikiAuth]].
mwa-config-importwatchlist: Description of the configuration variable $wgMediaWikiAuthImportWatchlist for [[mw:Extension:MediaWikiAuth|Extension:MediaWikiAuth]].
mwa-config-reattributeedits: Description of the configuration variable $wgMediaWikiAuthReattributeEdits for [[mw:Extension:MediaWikiAuth|Extension:MediaWikiAuth]].
mwa-error-unknown: Used as generic error message on account creation
mwa-authfail: Used as an error message to indicate the user was unable to log into the remote wiki, perhaps because they are using the wrong password.
mwa-authfail2: Used as an error message to indicate the user was unable to log into the remote wiki. $1 is the error message provided by the remote wiki.
mwa-finishcreate: Used as a success message that an account was imported, and is displayed above a field that lets the user change their password. $1 is the label of the Skip button so that the user can keep the same password.
mwa-finishimport-nocreate: Used as a success message that an account was imported, and is displayed above a field that requires the user to change their password. Used instead of mwa-finishcreate when we cannot allow them to hit 'skip' for technical reasons.
mwa-unconfiguredtitle: Used as the page title on the error page when the extension is not configured
mwa-unconfiguredtext: Used as the page text on the error page when the extension is not configured. $wgMediaWikiAuthApiUrl is a PHP variable name and must be preserved as-is; do not translate or modify it.
action-mwa-createlocalaccount:
{{doc-action|mwa-createlocalaccount}}
Right which allows the user to create a local account even if an importable account exists remotely.
right-mwa-createlocalaccount:
{{doc-right|mwa-createlocalaccount}}
Right which allows the user to create a local account even if an importable account exists remotely.
